resources.string:
Swipe up from the home screen to show all apps, and downwards to go back. 
 
Swipe down from the home screen to show favorites, and upwards to go back. 
 
Click the menu button (when showing favorites) or the launcher icon to open the menu. 
 
Long-hold an app or folder to access its settings.
Shows a popup of favorites above other apps when you leave the home screen.
A popup message is shown when refreshing the app list and icons, when starting, adding or removing apps, or if the icon pack is modified.
Manage folders or favorite them from the menu button, or click the title of an open folder to create, rename, and put apps in it. \nRemoving folders puts all apps in them back in the main list.
Find any app from the search icon. It can also be favorited to be available from the notification, or hidden. \n \nPressing \"Enter\" opens the first search result.
\"@pseudo\" indicates the user who suggested the idea or reported the bug
